name: 3D Space Game (bouddih_art)
description:
This is an infinite game. You have to destroy all enemies without die. This game was done by @bouddih_art. Please follow me on Instagram and Tik tok:

https://www.instagram.com/bouddih_art/

https://www.tiktok.com/@bouddih_art?lang=es

The controls are W,A,S,D and Space.
